entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as having top grades and being a prefect.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, feeling ashamed for failing in his task.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, examining a bottle and recounting Lord Voldemort's past.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: An old house-elf whose memory is being examined by Dumbledore.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Lord Voldemort's name before he became known as Voldemort.

entities.name: professor slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who expected great things from Tom Riddle.

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort's request made Harry feel ashamed for failing in his task.
Dumbledore is examining the memory of Hokey, an old house-elf.
Lord Voldemort and Tom Riddle are the same person.
Professor Slughorn expected great things from Tom Riddle.
